title.rendered: SBI Capital supports Smile on Wheels Project

content.rendered:
SBI Capital partners for healthcare access in Maharashtra

SBI Capital has supported Smile Foundation’s Smile on Wheels project in the Omerga block of Osmanabad district (Maharashtra). Through this collaboration, primary healthcare services were delivered to underserved communities in the region. This project has now concluded, leaving a lasting impact on local healthcare access and community well-being.

SBI Capital supports Smile on Wheels Project

SBI Capital has extended its support to the Smile on Wheels project in the Omerga block of Osmanabad district, Maharashtra. Thanks to this collaboration, a total of 15,734 beneficiaries have been able to access and benefit from primary healthcare services.

SBI Capital is the investment banking arm of the State Bank of India (SBI), India’s largest public sector bank. Established to provide specialized financial services, SBI Capital plays a crucial role in facilitating various capital market activities, mergers and acquisitions, project advisory, and infrastructure financing. With a strong commitment to fostering socio-economic development, SBI Capital actively engages in corporate social responsibility initiatives, supporting projects like Smile on Wheels that bring essential services to underserved communities and help improve their quality of life.
